body.name: Insulated Water Bottle 64 oz with Straw Lid (3 Lids), Half Gallon Jug Flask, Large Metal Stainless Steel Bottle, 64 oz Double Wall Vacuum Sports Thermo Mug, Cold 48H Hot 24H (Black)

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 55 mins
features: Food-Grade Materials: Crafted from durable food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, resistant to oxidation, BPA-free, odor-free, and safe for human use. It ensures liquids maintain their optimal taste at all times.

48H Cold & 24H Hot: Utilizing double-wall construction and vacuum-seal technology, this bottle keeps beverages cold for 48 hours and hot for 24 hours. The anti-sweat coating keeps the surface dry and clean, making it easy to grip.

3 Lids: This stainless steel bottle comes with a portable handle lid, an easy-twist spout lid, and a flip-up straw lid. With 100% leak-proof seals, it caters to various needs, including camping, hiking, cycling, and fitness activities.

Half-Gallon Capacity: With a 64 oz large capacity and a wide-mouth design, this bottle makes it easy to handle long journeys, reduce the need for refills, and keep your body hydrated and energized at all times.

Easy to care: This stainless steel cup is sturdy, rust-resistant, and sweat-proof, with a lifetime warranty. Hand wash only. Do not use a dishwasher or microwave. Not suitable for carbonated beverages.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Insulated water bottle is made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, double-layer vacuum insulation, keeping hot 24 hours and cold 48 hours. INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE Before First Use:Wash all parts with warm, soapy water.Rinse thoroughly and allow to dry.After Each Use:Wash all parts with warm, soapy water immediately.Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Allow to dry completely before the next use or storage.Important:Do not use bleach or detergents containing chlorine on any parts of the product.Maintenance:Hand Wash Only - This product is not dishwasher safe.Hand washing is recommended to ensure that all parts of the product are thoroughly cleaned. ====================================================================================================================

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good value!
reviews.reviewText: The carry pouch will not only make the water bottle easier to carry, but it will also insulate and protect the bottle. This is a neat addition to the packaging but what I really like is the inclusion of a brush and straw cleaner. Those two are very useful and will save anyone the hassle of having to buy a new one. Having a spare straw is nice too.The first thing I did when I got the bottle was wash it with soap and the included brush. After a good rinse and wash, I filled it with water and I am happy to announce that the water didn’t taste like metal or soap. There are no crevices for the soap to hide in, and the bottle doesn't flavor the water.There is a ring (they call it the safety ring) that goes around the bottle which has a carabiner and the paracord attached to it, I find the extra bulk a bit annoying, so I removed it from the bottle. I normally use the handle lid so to me the paracord was not needed. On the topic of the lid, the handle lid takes quite a bit of effort to close which is a real shame since the spout and straw lid both screw on smoothly. I appreciate that 3 different types of lids are included because I wouldn’t have considered this water bottle if not for the handle lid, I’m just not a big fan of other lid types.64 oz is enough for the whole day, some days I end up going through two 24oz bottles plus a disposable water bottle. Hopefully, this guy will allow me to only have 1 water bottle.If you like what you see nothing is keeping me from recommending this water bottle or recommending something instead of this water bottle. Its a solid product and it has more than you’ll need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on the go
reviews.reviewText: First, I love how large this water bottle is and that it has not only a handle but a strap as well for easy carrying. There are also 3 different lids that can be interchanged for the best drinking experience you're looking for (straw, small sip mouth, large sip mouth). Also, it comes with everything you need to clean the bottle and the straw. The cherry on top is that it comes with a sleeve that is easy to remove to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for hiking or working outdoors.
reviews.reviewText: This half-gallon metal flask is awesome and comes with everything you need. The flask itself is metal and keeps drinks cold all day even in outside in the heat. It comes with three lids for your choice of drinking style - with a straw, a smaller opening, or a fully open bottle. It comes with two straws for that drinking style as well as a straw cleaner and a foam bottle "brush". The cover is awesome to provide extra insulation and easy carrying. It's super easy to put on thanks to the zippered bottom of the cover, just unzip, cull over the top of the bottle, and zip it up. There is a shoulder strap as well as a paracord handle that includes a compass and whistle. It also has a carabiner in case you want to attach it to a hiking bag or hang it from something. The paracord and other things could come in handy in an emergency situation while hiking or camping. However, I got this for my husband to use for work as he works outside and needs lots of water to stay hydrated while working. This bottle is perfect for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big bottle, decent insulation
reviews.reviewText: I like how big this is. And I like that it has both a carrying case and the braided handle. This is a very large water bottle, which is great for me, since I drink a lot.I haven't tested the insulation fuly, but it does seem to keep my water cold for as long as I need it to.Overall no complaints.
